spiritsExplanation:
The workout embodies both 'Structured & Disciplined' and 'High-Energy & Intense' spirits. The 'Structured & Disciplined' spirit is very prominent, scoring 0.8, due to the methodical approach described: a 20-minute no-repeat session with 18 distinct exercises, specific work-rest intervals, and detailed structure in the description. Additionally, it avoids repetition, requiring precise transitions and technical precision across various exercises. 

The 'High-Energy & Intense' spirit is also present, with a score of 0.7, as indicated by the focus on building muscular definition and alternating between upper and lower body parts, aiming to enhance intensity and metabolic demand. Phrases such as 'most effective 20 minutes' and 'you will feel so accomplished and strong' reinforce the intense, energetic nature of the workout. 

Other potential spirits were excluded: 'Flow & Rhythm' is not indicated as the workout does not emphasize continuity or music-driven coordination; 'Soothing & Restorative' is not applicable due to the workout's high-intensity focus; 'Sport & Agility' and 'Outdoor & Adventure' are not relevant as the workout is neither sports-specific nor involves outdoor elements.
